name: NanobotDeconstructionEmitter
title: Nanobot Deconstruction Emitter
author: Asm_Nh
description: This mod adds Nanobot Deconstruction Emitter structure that can be used with Nanobots to serve deconstruction orders in large area. Emitter is single-placement only and picking it up to move is impossible - you'll have to build new one for every time you want to place it down.
